item.title: Day One
item.description: Digital Humanities This is my First blog about my studies in DIgital humanities This where I am learning, where i use my knowledge to research topic of my liking. Using Github, Gitbash, Hugo, Atom and other interesting “things” I have to show my understanding of things (even if i do not understand :D ) Let’s say, I am pure “humanitarian, so i struggle alot. My first blog will be about my idea of topic I want to look more into, Struggles of how to use something I have never used, and this an that Post my progression, achievements and more.
